HotelElement.Name: Cleyro Serviced Apartments Bristol City Centre

Description.Text: These serviced apartments are very central, in between the old Bristol city centre and Cabot Circus, Bristol's newest shopping centre. The apartments are ideally located within walking distance of Bristol Temple Meads train station and all the city centre attractions. The apartment block has been converted from the site of a former Brewery, originally Georges Brewery and more recently, Courage, which was closed in 1999. You will find some beautiful stone walls and fantastic architecture from the original building still in place today. Staying with Cleyro offers you so much more, you can expect a fully fitted designer kitchen, including an oven, microwave and fridge freezer, kettle and toaster. Our lounge includes a two seat luxurious sofa to relax on; with a flat screen freeview TV and DVD player. The dining area has a dining table with four chairs and all the crockery and cutlery you would need. All bedrooms have wardrobes and plenty of storage space. Soft linens and towels are included for your stay. The bathroom is tiled from floor to ceiling and includes a contemporary glass door shower. All apartments come with a hairdryer, iron and ironing board as well as a washer/dryer. There are double-glazed windows to keep out all the hustle and bustle of the city, security self-locking doors and electronic fob access to enter the building and ensure your safety. At Cleyro we work a little differently. We offer a personalised check in service, meeting you at the development to show you around. Therefore we ask you to please contact us after making your booking to arrange your check in time. Please note that we operate a minimum stay of 2 nights during weekends.

Next door to the apartments, you will find Bristol Bridge. It was from here that the city of Bristol was first formed back in Saxon times as Brycgstow, meaning 'place of the bridge'. The original Saxon bridge would have been timber-built, but Bristol grew to become a major port, in the 1240s Bristol followed London in replacing its bridge in stone. Today the bridge is listed as a Grade 2 listed building.

Deluxe Apartment - Our one bedroom deluxe apartments offer contemporary living in the heart of Bristol. All our deluxe apartments are fully furnished with everything necessary for a short or long term stay. With a with large open plan living rooms to relax in and free WIFI in all apartments you can feel at home. Deluxe Apartment offers one Double bed.
